user_query: My company is expanding its operations and we need to exchange a large amount of currency. Can you provide the current exchange rate from Euro (EUR) to United States Dollar (USD) for an amount of 100,000? Additionally, fetch the details of available blockchains for our financial transactions.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current exchange rate from Euro (EUR) to United States Dollar (USD) for an amount of 100,000.
Fetch details of available blockchains for financial transactions.
